rules_text:
Prowess [i](Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create an Idol token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
